review_text: Can't chop anything well.  [Tried onions, tomatoes, celery, olives, nuts, and many other items.]  Tried 2, 4, and 8-oz loads.  Tried 1/8, 1/4, 1/2 cup loads.All you get is half mush and the other half "as is".I think it could "mix" 1/4 cup of cooked rice with a 1/2 cup of water ... but who needs that?This will be the last Cuisinart product I'll buy; their griddler, blender, and ice cream maker are poorly engineered too ... and I long ago stopped using them.
product_name: Cuisinart DLC-1 Mini-Prep Food Processor, White
